devdoc.author: Solady (https://github.com/vectorized/solady/blob/main/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol)Modified from Solmate (https://github.com/transmissions11/solmate/blob/main/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol)Permit2 operations from (https://github.com/Uniswap/permit2/blob/main/src/libraries/Permit2Lib.sol)
devdoc.details: Note: - For ETH transfers, please use `forceSafeTransferETH` for DoS protection.

Permit2AmountOverflow().details: The Permit2 amount must be less than `2**160 - 1`.

Permit2ApproveFailed().details: The Permit2 approve operation has failed.

Permit2LockdownFailed().details: The Permit2 lockdown operation has failed.

DAI_DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.details: The unique EIP-712 domain separator for the DAI token contract.

ETH_MOVER.details: The canonical address of the `SELFDESTRUCT` ETH mover. See: https://gist.github.com/Vectorized/1cb8ad4cf393b1378e08f23f79bd99fa [Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x00000000000073c48c8055bD43D1A53799176f0D)

GAS_STIPEND_NO_GRIEF.details: Suggested gas stipend for contract receiving ETH to perform a few storage reads and writes, but low enough to prevent griefing.

GAS_STIPEND_NO_STORAGE_WRITES.details: Suggested gas stipend for contract receiving ETH that disallows any storage writes.

WETH9.details: The address for the WETH9 contract on Ethereum mainnet.

userdoc.notice: Safe ETH and ERC20 transfer library that gracefully handles missing return values.
